sentences.english: Is your focus on productivity starting to make you feel miserable or stressed out?
sentences.chinese: 如果你追求效能時開始感到痛苦或是精疲力竭？

sentences.english: I screamed in pain as the knife cut the surface layer of my skin.
sentences.chinese: 我的皮膚被割開了，我痛苦的嘶叫着。

sentences.english: RS_Halion_Phase2. wav - You will find only suffering within the realm of Twilight.
sentences.chinese: 在暮光的勢力範圍，你得到的只有痛苦。

sentences.english: And, of course, the research into pain continues.
sentences.chinese: 當然，對痛苦的研究仍在繼續。

sentences.english: Tears are sometimes rolling down from your cheek whenever thinking of the past painful hardship and hurting experience.
sentences.chinese: 每當想起過去痛苦與傷心，眼淚總是潸然流下。

sentences.english: And rarely should a man cry in pain.
sentences.chinese: 而且男人很少該在痛苦中哭泣。

sentences.english: I was busy but miserable at twenty.
sentences.chinese: 我的二十歲是繁忙併且痛苦的。

sentences.english: I think many people think suffering is dire starvation or poverty.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得許多人認爲痛苦就是可怕的飢餓和貧困。

sentences.english: Why was its bursting so painful?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼泡沫破裂讓我們如此痛苦不堪？

sentences.english: When it occurs in the back near the spinal cord or the nerve roots, it can be very painful.
sentences.chinese: 如果正好發生在脊椎或神經附近的話會非常痛苦。

sentences.english: Noda Take regret the pain, two people fall together.
sentences.chinese: 野田毅後悔痛苦，二人倒在了一起。

sentences.english: How quickly their shrieks of pain turn to enraptured adulation.
sentences.chinese: 它們痛苦的尖叫迅速轉變成對吾等恩賜的狂熱諂媚。

sentences.english: It is already so painful for this monkey.
sentences.chinese: 這實驗已經讓猴子頗爲痛苦了。

sentences.english: What they say is almost unimaginably painful to me.
sentences.chinese: 他們所說的對我來說幾乎是無法想象的痛苦。

sentences.english: What are some of your pain-avoiding and pleasure-inducing patterns?
sentences.chinese: 你有哪些讓自己脫離痛苦和獲得歡樂的方式？

sentences.english: Hearing this, Wilbur threw himself down in an agony of pain and sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這話，威爾伯癱坐下來，極度痛苦和悲傷。

definition: to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to feel sad/to feel unwell/(of life) to be difficult
